name: PREMIER FOOD GROUP, INC.
description: Delivers food for private pay companies & state & fed agencies in response to emergencies.
sampleDescriptions: Working with FEMA response to food needs following 2021 Hurricane IDA in Louisiana.  Also exploring ways to assist and participate in various food distribution programs inside of USDA.
